main event: Three round objects in 'V' formation, flying at a high rate of speed, passed across the horizon and disappeared over the horizon on July 1, 1960.
interesting points: The objects were reported to be moving at a high rate of speed and in a distinct formation., The time of the sighting was around 9:00 p.m. with clear sky and good visibility., The sighting lasted approximately 3-5 minutes., Witness reports indicated that the objects were not identified as aircraft., Air Force investigations concluded that the objects were determined to be aircraft.
witness description: Various witnesses including families, with descriptions noting erratic movements and large size.
